members.name: hideKeyboardAccessoryBar
members.description: Hide the keyboard accessory bar with the next, previous and done buttons.

members.name: disableScroll
members.description: Prevents the native UIScrollView from moving when an input is focused.

members.name: onKeyboardShow
members.description: Creates an observable that notifies you when the keyboard is shown. Unsubscribe to observable to cancel event watch.

members.name: onKeyboardHide
members.description: Creates an observable that notifies you when the keyboard is hidden. Unsubscribe to observable to cancel event watch.
